title: CineStrings - Core
rawText:
CineStrings - Core
Orchestral Strings
CineStrings is a full orchestral string library recorded at the world-famous MGM Scoring Stage at Sony Pictures Studios in Los Angeles and recorded by industry veteran Dennis Sands.

title: CineStrings - Solo
rawText:
CineStrings - Solo
Solo Strings
Recorded at MGM Scoring Scoring Stage at Sony Pictures Studios in Los Angeles, CineStrings Solo gives you all the tools to create independent string sections to score any scene.

title: CineStrings - Runs
rawText:
CineStrings - Runs
Orchestral Strings
Recorded at the MGM Scoring Stage at Sony Pictures Studios in Los Angeles, CineStrings Runs is an essential addition to the CineSymphony series. The library features a range of performed runs in different scales, directions, and lengths, as well as other colorful string textures and effects to expand your template.

Runs and FX

 |

title: CineStrings - Pro
rawText:
CineStrings - Pro
Orchestral Strings
Recorded at the MGM Scoring Stage at Sony Pictures Studios in Los Angeles, CineStrings PRO is the final installment of the CineStrings series. The library features a range of new articulations for both ensemble and individual string sections, including appassionata, con sordino, and more. Also included traditional articulations such as legato, sustain, shorts, and FX.

rawText:
Hyperion Strings Core
Finely-crafted orchestral strings for everyone
Hyperion Strings is a orchestral string collection built for everyone. This finely-crafted virtual instrument has a present and robust sound unlike any other, with a rich full-bodied tone and wide dynamic range. The Core collection presents all legato, sustained and short articulations.
